title: Pokemon Sleep Tier List
description: This is a tier list for the mobile game Pokémon Sleep. The list is based on the overall usefulness of each Pokémon in the game. Pokémon are ranked from S Tier (the best) to B Tier (the worst). The tier list is based on my opinion and the opinions of other players. Your own tier list may vary depending on your playstyle and preferences.
heading: Pokemon Sleep Tier List
introText: This is a tier list for the mobile game Pokémon Sleep. The list is based on the overall usefulness of each Pokémon in the game. Pokémon are ranked from S Tier (the best) to B Tier (the worst). The tier list is based on my opinion and the opinions of other players. Your own tier list may vary depending on your playstyle and preferences.

data.itemDescription: Dragonite is the best overall Pokémon in Pokémon Sleep. It has high berry and ingredient capacity, as well as a great skill that increases the amount of Fiery Herbs you get
Magnezone is another great all-around Pokémon. It has high berry and ingredient capacity, and its skill increases the amount of Pure Oil you get
Feraligatr is the best Pokémon for Cyan Beach. It has a high berry capacity and a skill that doubles the amount of Oran Berries you get
Typhlosion is the best Pokémon for Taupe Hollow. It has a high ingredient capacity and a skill that doubles the amount of Lava Stones you get
Walrein is the best Pokémon for Snowdrop Tundra. It has a high berry capacity and a skill that doubles the amount of Icicle Berries you get
Meganium is the best Pokémon for Lapis Lakeside. It has a high ingredient capacity and a skill that doubles the amount of Water Bubbles you get
Venusaur is a great all-around Pokémon with a high berry capacity and a skill that increases the amount of Green Grass Corn you get
Charizard is another great all-around Pokémon with a high ingredient capacity and a skill that increases the amount of Fiery Herbs you get
Butterfree is a good Pokémon for early game progression. It has a high sleep score and a skill that increases the amount of EXP you get
Primeape is a good Pokémon for gathering ingredients. It has a high ingredient capacity and a skill that increases the amount of Honey you get
Dodrio is a good Pokémon for gathering berries. It has a high berry capacity and a skill that increases the amount of Cheri Berries you get
Kangaskhan is a good Pokémon for both gathering berries and ingredients. It has high berry and ingredient capacity, and a skill that increases the amount of Pinap Berries you get
Ampharos is a good Pokémon for late game progression. It has a high sleep score and a skill that increases the amount of EXP you get from other Pokémon
Snorlax is a good Pokémon for early game progression. It has a high sleep score and a skill that increases the amount of time you spend sleeping
Jigglypuff is another good Pokémon for early game progression. It has a high sleep score and a skill that increases the amount of coins you get
Meowth is a good Pokémon for gathering coins. It has a skill that increases the amount of coins you get from sleeping
Lucario is a good Pokémon for battling. It has a high attack stat and a skill that increases the amount of damage you deal
Garchomp is another good Pokémon for battling. It has a high speed stat and a skill that increases the chance of you getting a critical hit
